movies.title: Gallino, the Chicken System
movies.plot: An strange meeting at night in a poultry store lost in Antarctica. A story full of lechery, sarcasm, extravagance, impossible geometries, discovery of existence's hidden sides and a pinch of Magick.
movies.simplePlot: An strange meeting at night in a poultry store lost in Antarctica. A story full of lechery, sarcasm, extravagance, impossible geometries, discovery of existence's hidden sides and a pinch of Magick.

biography.bio: Octavi Pujades was born on July 1, 1974 in Sabadell, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Octavi Pujades Boix. He is an actor, known for Centro médico (2015), Ciega a citas (2014) and Lalola (2008). He has been married to Eva since 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Octavi Pujades

biography.bio: Manel Solás is an actor, known for The Nameless (1999), FAQ: Frequently Asked Questions (2004) and Codex Atanicus (2007).
biography.name: Manel Solás

biography.bio: Sasha Slugina is an actress and cinematographer, known for Gallino, the Chicken System (2012), Zona de Caza (2012) and Metal Creepers (2011).
biography.name: Sasha Slugina

biography.bio: Pablo Puyol was born on December 26, 1975 in Málaga, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain as Pablo Puyol Ledesma. He is an actor, known for 20 centimètres (2005), Un, Dos, Tres (2002) and Boystown (2007).
biography.name: Pablo Puyol

biography.bio: Itxaso Badell is an actress, known for Gallino, the Chicken System (2012) and Regression Post Panic Film (2011).
biography.name: Itxaso Badell

biography.bio: Anitta Rock is an actress, known for Gallino, the Chicken System (2012).
biography.name: Anitta Rock

biography.bio: Antonio Albella was born in 1968 in Alcalá de Henares, Madrid, Spain. He is an actor, known for Gallino, the Chicken System (2012), Cambio de sentido (2010) and La espina de Dios (2015).
biography.name: Antonio Albella

biography.bio: José Lifante was born on June 3, 1943 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as José Ruiz Lifante. He is an actor, known for The Adventures of Baron Munchausen (1988), Dagon (2001) and The Living Dead at Manchester Morgue (1974). He has been married to Elisenda Ribas since 1974.
biography.name: José Lifante

biography.bio: Gabriela Martínez-Gil is an actress, known for Gallino, the Chicken System (2012).
biography.name: Gabriela Martínez-Gil

biography.bio: Rafael Fernández is an actor and director, known for Los Hombres Caballo (2011) and Gallino, the Chicken System (2012).
biography.name: Rafael Fernández

biography.bio: Víctor Conde is an actor and assistant director, known for The Marvellous World of the Cucu Bird (1991), Gallino, the Chicken System (2012) and El parc (1992).
biography.name: Víctor Conde

biography.bio: Born in Salamanca, Spain. Aránzazu went on to attend Salamanca University, where she studied computer engineer. She moved to Madrid to start to work at Hewllet Packard when she was 21 years old. Her acting career began when she was approached in a Melbourne restaurant by actor Gerard Butler, who gave her a new vision of her world. Then Aranzazu decided to start a new life acting.
biography.name: Aranzazu Diez

biography.bio: Mar Vico is an actress, known for 100 balas (2005), On-Line 3 (2013) and Mil sonrisas (2014).
biography.name: Mar Vico

biography.bio: Beatriz Urzáiz is an actress and producer, known for Witching and Bitching (2013), The Lady of the Damned Forest and Se busca (2014).
biography.name: Beatriz Urzáiz

biography.bio: Eva García-Vacas is an actress, known for Mariquita con perro (2007), Le costard (2002) and Gallino, the Chicken System (2012).
biography.name: Eva García-Vacas
